page.title: 03EAST MEON FORGE.
page.content: All aspects of the trade of blacksmith except shoeing is carried out including repair and maintenance of agricultural and horticultural machinery.Many types of welding and brazing,carpentry and property repairs.The main activity is the construction of steel gates,railings, firebaskets and fire accessories to order,but any metalwork to customer's requirement is undertaken.One of the original two forge hearths is still in use virtually daily for the heat treatment of tools such as chisels,axes etc. after sharpening, although hand bellows have been replaced with an electrically driven air blower.Wrought iron is rarely used having been replaced by mild steel although there is still a requirement to refurbish old wrought and cast iron gates and railings.
